content:
TransportType TransportType Enum

Definition

Namespace:
Assembly:
Microsoft.Azure.Devices.Client.UWP.dll

Transport types supported by DeviceClient - AMQP/TCP, HTTP 1.1, MQTT/TCP, AMQP/WS, MQTT/WS

Edit

In this Article

public enum TransportTypePublic Enum TransportType

Fields

Amqp Amqp

Advanced Message Queuing Protocol transport. Try Amqp over TCP first and fallback to Amqp over WebSocket if that fails
Amqp_Tcp_Only Amqp_Tcp_Only

Advanced Message Queuing Protocol transport over native TCP only
Amqp_WebSocket_Only Amqp_WebSocket_Only

Advanced Message Queuing Protocol transport over WebSocket only.
Http1 Http1

HyperText Transfer Protocol version 1 transport.
Mqtt Mqtt

Message Queuing Telemetry Transport. Try Mqtt over TCP first and fallback to Mqtt over WebSocket if that fails
Mqtt_Tcp_Only Mqtt_Tcp_Only

Message Queuing Telemetry Transport over native TCP only
Mqtt_WebSocket_Only Mqtt_WebSocket_Only

Message Queuing Telemetry Transport over Websocket only.
